label: AgriculturalProcess
comment: A practice of cultivating land, raising crops, or treatment of the agricultural produce.

datatypeProperties.comment: The date, time, date time or other date time value of the actual end for the crop production in this agricultural process.
The date, time, date time or other date time value for the actual start of the crop production in this agricultural process.
A specified agricultural application applied to this agricultural zone area.
The date, time, date time or other date time value for the earliest start of the crop production in this agricultural process.
A crop produce batch harvested in the crop production for this agricultural process.
The date, time, date time or other date time value of the latest end for the crop production in this agricultural process.
A set of instructions detailing how to properly dispose of a material.
Any materials unused and rejected as unwanted during a production process.
A field crop specified for this crop production agricultural process.
The code specifying the subordinate type for this production device.

referencedBy.comment: An agricultural process crop production applicable for this field crop.
